The lack of respect and understanding is so disappointing.  Holiday Inn thanks you for their increased business.
The hotel was great! Nice and clean with a great breakfast. The pool is enormous. front desk staff was extremely nice. They opened a bottle of wine for us when we forgot our bottle opener.

Bedding was comfortable, staff friendly, pool area really nice (includes a kiddie area that is pretty cool if you have kids and a nice whirlpool. Main pool has hoops. Huge area). Breakfast was ok, some eggs, sausage, waffles, fruit, cereal and bread. Your normal.

This was the quality, cleanliness, and overall experience I would expect at a Comfort Suites. No issues whatsoever. Clean, comfortable room; clean lobby, good breakfast, internet service worked well. Will definitely stay here again.

Comfort Suites in Johnson Creek is a brand new hotel located right on a heritage trail so if you have time for a walk, it is excellent to get fresh air. Everything was fresh and clean. The staff is more than accommodating. I love pet-friendly hotels!

Hotel was comparable to others, but was more expensive. At check in wasn’t welcoming and it took three times to get our room key to work. The room darkening curtains purposely didn’t close, the water was very hard, there was an old coffee filter in the maker, the closet handle didn’t work (locking my kid in the closet til someone let her out), and the jets in the hot tub weren’t working. The beds were comfortable, the pool was nice, and breakfast was decent.
Loved out stay at this facility! Great pool area, delicious breakfast, quiet surroundings. The staff were polite and efficient, and the rooms were clean, spacious, and quiet. We'll stay here again!

Love this hotel only. I stop here regularly if you travel for work this is the hotel for you they treat your construction workers good .... only giving it a 4 due to nothing in walking distance & not fresh brewed coffee they do have a automated coffee vending machine but it taste like mud beside that the hotel is great. All kinds of amenities like huge hot tub, giant pool even kid pool to keep them busy, fitness center with weight sets, locker room, multiple bath rooms, vending area, rooms super nice very comfy beds ......will return again an again

Highly recommend this hotel. The only reasons I did not give this hotel a 10 on everything was because when I called to get the room originally, the lady whom answered the phone could not speak English very clearly and could not understand …
Couldn't find reservations for several people.  2 gals would help on Thursday afternoon, but the Friday AM girl was NOT helpful at all and left a bad taste in my mouth.  …

We had our wedding there and there was no communication when they fired their event coordinators, twice! Branden was the only staff member there through it all and made our day successful, bending over backwards to make us happy. …

Great place for a nights stay. We were there for 4 nights and had a good experience. Breakfast was good, beds were good. We did enjoy it. I noticed that they did not dust the top and the back of the TV.

The event room was awesome, very clean and well taken care of, not cold or too warm, and had lots of access. The bar available was also really nice. The bathrooms we're well taken care of as well. Would totally do another event there.

I found that the check in process was very easy. My room was very nice and clean. The internet service was very good and very accessible throughout the complex. Checking our was easy and convenient. The quality of the morning breakfast offerings was not very imprressive. The overall experience was good.
Spent 2 nights here, very recommended. Clean room, nice breakfast and friendly staff.

I recently stayed @ the Johnson Creek Comfort Suites for work. My stay of 37 nights was very comfortable and the staff was very professional and friendly from the top on down. Christine & her staff made it feel like home from day 1. Special thanks goes out to Rico & Sergio for pouring very good drinks!
Great place to stay!! Good open breakfast area with lots of individually wrapped items! Nice open pool an hot tub. Big clean rooms!! Will definitely be coming back.

This hotel needs a big upgrade.  From the lighting to the mattresses, the property is tired and worn out.  I found the stay to be less than average.  It is a shame - other properties in the area have stepped up and this one is left in the last century.

A very nice and clean hotel. Very large room for our family of four. Very nice pool area. Was surprised to see a kiddie area, because the photos didn't show it on the website. Look forward to staying here again sometime.

Wonderful experience.  First class service. We needed a comfortable place near our family in Lake Mills that would accept dogs. I grew up in the area and was surprised Johnson Creek had such a classy offering.

While the location is still "in the boondocks", we love this hotel for large, quiet rooms, wonderful multi-pool area, quality breakfast and natural setting.  So glad to see the meeting area filled with groups each day and yet the complex is so large we hardly noticed.

Hotel rooms very spacious, helpful staff, and very neat. Only downfall was the lobby was being remodeled. It was a little bit bothersome but not too terrible. There was nothing really in the area besides the hotel, but it was nice so I guess it was worth it

We stayed for 2 nights in a Jacuzzi suite. Very nice and clean room. This was our third time staying here. The staff was very friendly. The hotel itself was clean and decorated nice. Over all a great place to come for a getaway weekend.

Hotel overall was nice. Warm breakfast was better than most hotels for that price. Exterior doors were secure as far as locked and needed key to get in. Beds were kind of hard, disappointed on that aspect. Overall it was a decent hotel for the money spent.
Room was very neat and clean. Beds were very soft and comfortable. The pool was well maintained and breakfast was phenomenal. 10/10 would stay again
Wonderful stay! Very clean and comfortable rooms. Excellent staff that will go the extra mile to insure a fantastic stay. Can't wait to return for our next trip.

Considering the noise from people in room above us after several calls to front desk and attempts to quiet them we were asked to move to a quieter room!! Not them asked to leave hotel! Then key cards did not work in new room. …

Our anniversary was June 21st and my wife has been in Wisconsin since May19th taking care of our grandchildren since my daughter-in-law's mother has cancer and taking treatments she is not able to do so. …

Because of either wrong keys or wrong room assignment we were unable to get into our room. After a few trips to the desk to try to correct a woman in housekeeping was able to let us in, she tried to correct problem with man at desk and still couldn't produce working keys. So they called in a maintenance man in to fix lock bit he didn't arrive for 3 hrs.  We were unable to leave our room together or we couldn't re enter. Unable to use hot tub/ pool.  We spent alot of money to be held up in our room.  VERY DISSATISFIED!
Overall it was a good hotel. Very kid friendly. Hallways were very dark. Room could have used a deep cleaning and vacuuming. Staff was friendly and breakfast was really good!

Hotel was clean but bathroom floor and tub could use some detailed attention. It was decent though. The beds were hard my husband and I were both up several times due to being uncomfortable. Pillows were great!

The hotel itself was very nice.  It was clean and the rooms are a nice size.  We were not happy that we did not get the rooms we were promised, in fact we got two rooms that were the farthest apart they could.  They were on different floors and different ends of the hotel, a far cry from ajjoining rooms.
We found the room last minute after having our other rooms canceled at a different hotel. The room size is great, very clean and a staff that is very nice whenever we see them.

We stayed here while attending a show at the Fireside. The room was clean, comfortable and spacious. WiFi signal strong. Pool area above average. Breakfast very adequate. Staff both at the desk and on phone very friendly.

We have stayed at the Roadway Inn in Jefferson for the last 21 years every spring and fall. Well they messed up our reservation and so we booked with them here. I will NEVER go back to Roadway in Jefferson unless they get new ownership. …

The hotel is clean, updated and the staff are courteous and friendly. The only difficulty is the tendency for the lights to go off and the need for us to call the front desk and wait for them to fix the problem. The breakfast is typical but it would be nice if they offered some local food choices.

Nice hotel and the staff was very nice. Housekeeping was a little slow and apologized for not cleaning our room and taking so long to get us towels. That, however, will not keep me from staying here next year!

DONT WASTE YOUR TIME ON THIS PLACE, go to another hotel in the area. Most disorganized and rude front desk staff I've encountered. First, they lost our reservation, then we wake up the next day to find they messed up completely and booked us for one night after we expressly asked for a two night stay through the wedding block. When asked if there was anything that could be done the front desk clerk was very rude. Now I find they charged us a late fee! Bottom line: save yourself the headache, stay somewhere else.

This has to be the most backwards hotel I've ever had the misfortune to stay at. Sitting in the lobby right now as we can't go to a room, as the only open ones are dirty.... at 730pm. 1st room we were given, housekeeping hadn't been to, at all. Bed sheets were strewn everywhere, dirty towels on the bathroom floor, garbage full, and soaps all gone. 2nd room we were given smelled like smoke, was only partially clean, and wasn't even near the block of rooms we were supposed to be staying in. I'd give less stars if possible, because there's one star hotels that would make this place ashamed. Oh, and when I asked to talk to the manager? "Theyll be gone for the weekend." Yeah, this is BS.

The rooms are nice - spacious and comfortable. Pool area is great, with a pool for the bigger kids, hot tub, and wading pool for the little ones. We also rented a conference room for a baby shower. That space was nice as well.
I'll be making it a point to seek out this location in the future when back to this area.  I often work in the room early morning or end of day since traveling for business.  …

As usual, I had put on hundreds of miles in a day, was close to home, but was driving tired. The hotel was off the main highway in a quiet location. A suite provided space to stretch and rest before continuing on my journey.

We came to Johnson Creek to visit friens who live near by in Jefferson. We had never stayed at a Comfort Suites but it was a FABULOUS stay! Are room was very clean and spacious!! There wasn't a ton of interaction with the hotel staff but kost everyone was cordial. We would totally stay here again!
large room, comfortable bed, decent internet, walls are pretty thin we were on the second floor and above us there was a lot of noise sounded like kids jumping on the bed to the floor.  …

Very comfortable and friendly feel. The pools were great. We'd love to see kiddie pools like this in other Comfort Suites. I have not been disappointed in any Comfort Hotel until this trip and it was not at this location.

We were not happy with our stay this past week at the Comfort Suites Johnson Creek. Several things were wrong. 1. Kiddie pool closed with no explanation. 2. Large amount of hair left on shower wall. 3. White dental bands left in several places on room floor. 4. Front desk could not give us answers.

I thought the staff was fantastic. Our room was mostly clean. We had a 2 night stay with our 2nd night in a different room and they were efficient and polite about getting us moved over to our second room.

My sister and I were a wee bit confused as to how to get to the facility from the outlet mall. However, once we saw your signs, it was quite clear. We enjoyed the quiet atmosphere both inside and out. I would highly recommend your facility to anyone. Next time I am in the area to see a play at the Fireside, I will book my room with you!
Stayed at the Comfort Suites 3 nights. Clean, nice breakfast, staff was amazing. Lilly the manager was very kind. Went above and beyond making sure event was perfect.
The Comfort Suites in Johnson Creek Wi is a spacious, Quiet location complete with  bird viewing, hearty breakfast, shopping, and variety of restaurants nearby. …

Good quality for the price. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Very modern and spacious rooms, the TV's are a little small. Breakfast is a little below par, but for the price you can buy your own breakfast.

The rooms are nice a big. It's a newer facility so things are fresh and modern. Ive stayed here a couple of times. It's a little off the beaten path, but less than a 5 minute drive from the Johnson Creek mall and restaurants.

Truly a great hotel. Rooms were large, clean, and quiet. Amenities were more than expected. The ONLY thing that would have made this better was to know my favorite pizza place delivered! (my fault for not asking)

While this has the potential to be a good hotel, the attitude of the staff and the disregard for people smoking in non smoking areas will keep them from succeeding. Any problem, large or small, and you are told to talk to the manager who returns 4 days later.
The suite was large and well furnished. The heating unit was quiet and effective. …

Fine place, but they are so understaffed it's painful. 45 minutes to check in, and counting. Poor employees. Later...  check-in took an hour. It appears only 1 employee is working.  So, I should have written poor employee.
Not a great stay.  no food on the breakfast in the morning after a COLD shower. …

Chose to stay here because of the hot tub and whirlpool suite.  The hot tub is being renovated so not able to use.  Our room has cob webs in the corners a cigarette burn in the bathroom. Going to sleep this evening and there is no way to close the drapes,  the lights from the parking lot shine right into the room making it difficult to sleep.

Great rooms very well cleaned service was amazing and I loved the location I went to this hotel with my family to see my grandma and she was visiting and she loved the room and everyone at the desk was very kind I recommend this 5 stars hotel up all the way and hope to you see everyone again sometime thank you
Great hotel. The hot breakfast was great! The swimming pool was fantastic. Had a hot tub, a regular pool, and a play area for little kids. The beds were comfortable and rooms were up to date.
Unfortunately I have a long list of complaints about this stay. First, I was unable to check in until after 3:50 due to both a computer glitch and apparently a short staff of house keepers. …

Having stayed in several "pet-friendly" hotels, I am appalled by our visit to Comfort Suites Johnson Creek. After attending a wedding, my husband and I arrived back to the room to find that our dog, who was crated, had been removed. In his place was a note stating he was barking too much and had been moved to the front office area. We did not receive any calls throughout the night to inform us of barking problems or the decision to enter our room and relocate our most important property - our dog.  I would rather have been notified of the problem, in which case I would have left the wedding early, as opposed to having my dog taken from our room by strangers and stored in an unfamiliar area for hours. Never before have we encountered this type of "pet-friendliness". This hotel has no written or published policy stating dogs who bark will be removed from rooms, unbeknownst to their owners. If I had seen that written in a policy, I wouldn't have put my dog through this trauma.
Stayed one night at the hotel and that Sunday morning there was no hot water. Was told that the water heater was being fixed. …
We always stay at this hotel on trip to Wisconsin. Very familiar with surroundings and price is perfect. Friendly people.

I guess choice hotels aren't requiring masks? Saw plenty of employees,  I was the only person in this hotel that wore one that I could see.  The hotel is a nice one, it was clean and pleasant but I'm on the way to visit my elderly mother and in laws,  so no thank you to the  respiratory droplets,  I'll be more careful about the next hotel I pick.

Great hotel for travelers with dogs. Large fields surround the hotel for 'airing'. Really clean, staff was very accommodating... offering to find a room on the first floor so we didn't have to carry our suitcases so far.
Dirty hotel, couch was almost black from the dirt. Rooms smelled terrible! The breakfast sucked, and there is no fresh coffee , only a machine. One positive is the pool was pretty cool.
This hotel offers a very clean and comfortable accommodation. There is a nice pool and hot tub and a great free breakfast. The staff does an excellent job. You will enjoy your time here.

We have stayed at the Jefferson Comfort Suites twice a year for the past 4 years and we are always satisfied with the rooms and staff, clean and courteous. We've had minor issues in the past but they were taken care of immediately. Would highly recommend!
I stayed in a separate room on a Friday because I was getting married on Saturday and it was just a let down not being able to really watch anything since half the channels didn't come in.  …
The building was dirty.  The floors were not even cleaned at night, but the dirt built up. Our group was disappointed in the facility.

This is one of the best stays I have had in a long time,. The bed was awesome. The breakfast had a great selection and very tasty. Day of checkout they had a craft show which was a fun surprise. Will stay here again!!!!

Congratulations out of the 100 hotels I've stayed in this year your hotel was the 1st and only hotel to give me bed bugs in room 216 thanks now I'm paying someone to make sure my house bug free. I've got at least 20 bites on me. Stayed 09/27/2017 sorry this was quality Inn  not comfort suites.

This hotel was the only one within miles that had any rooms because of multiple conventions around the surrounding areas. I was worried because we like staying closer to the highway but this was our last resort. Luckily they had a room for us. The room was more than we usually get in a standard room, with a couch, mini fridge and microwave. Room was clean and hotel was nice and quiet.

Fantastic hotel!  Fantastic, friendly, helpful staff.  Indoor pool area is HUGE and much like a water park.  The hotel is very specious with lots of meeting rooms.  Rooms are spacious as well.  Hotel is set off the beaten path in a beautiful relatively secluded area.  Loved it!
Very nice place. Clean, great breakfast and nice staff just don't take the rooms next to the elevator because you will be awakened by a loud noise coming from the elevator.

I stay at this hotel on occasion when traveling for business. Everything about this hotel is excellent. However, if I could make one small suggestion, it would be to improve the lighting in the bathrooms. The present lighting is not very bright, and it makes things like shaving somewhat difficult.

clean and comfortable stay. Pool was clean but was heavily chlorinated as most pools causing eye irritation. Significant issues with the Internet and hotel computer systems during our stay causing issues with stay extensions. Included breakfast was standard.
This hotel was quiet and clean. Worth the money. The easy access to the outlet and Watertown makes this a better choice from the ones in town. It was quiet and no noise from traffic.

The hotel was great staff great just 1 bad incident does make you wonder if they did anything about it or not seeing it went on for several hours after. And I'm sure if I would have went back they would probably said we can change your room . Why would I get penalized for something I didn't do. Just do your job.
Great place to stay and room very clean and helpful staff. The pool was a big hit with the grandkids and spent many hours there. Breakfast was good and the staff member was awesome.
Great hotel a little off the beaten path, but excellent. Clean rooms, nice pool area and they made us a "too go bag" because we where leaving before breakfast started.
I highly recommend this hotel.  The hotel and rooms are immaculate.  The staff are very accommodating, friendly and helpful.  …
Enjoyed my stay while I was attending Wisconsin Sheep and Wool Festival at Fair Park in Jefferson, WI.  This is the 4th stay at this hotel and I love the jacuzzi pool.  …
The hotel in Johnson Creek, WI was impressive.  The room was spacious, up-to-date, and very clean.  There is a beautiful hot tub, and pool area there.  The breakfast is an added bonus.

Very nice hotel overall. Rooms are very comfortable. Bathrooms were very well maintained. Large seating area in the room for TV viewing. Swimming pool and large hot tub very nice. The General Manager Christine was outstanding.
I love this hotel. It is my "home way from home" two times a year. My room is always clean, always well maintained. It's a beautiful hotel. EXCELLENT breakfast.

Accommodations were very good, only thing that did not work for us was the 24hour room cancellation policy as are departure date depended on whether our baseball team won or lost each game they played during the day. We had to check out and back in each day due to that policy.

Staff is very helpful and accommodating. Check in and Check out staff both very warm and friendly. Enough breakfast choices to make us all happy. We booked for late arrival and loved that the pool was open until 11 PM.
Nice place to get away and just relax. It was a great weekend and I had some me time and self care. …

Visited on room: old furniture with a cigarette burn; bathroom door hard to close.The pool is big but past its glory days. Rust and paint chipping. You'll be blown away by the kiddy pool spray.In the middle of a field and lots of semi and trucks.

The hotel was very nice... the service was great; the free breakfast was satisfactory; and the pool was perfect for the kids. As a family trying to get away with the kids for a few nights, this was perfect!

The towels where old and worn felt cheap and uncomfortable. The hotel seemed as though it had no insulation between the rooms so if anyone in the rooms around me so much as moved I would hear it. And lastly the breakfast the choices where extremely limited and sometimes not thoroughly cooked.
As far as the hotel itself, its perfect.  The pool is perfect, the scenery is perfect.  The breakfast is good.  BUT if you're "darker", please stand clear🤣🤣🤣🤦🏽‍♀️

The room was clean and the breakfast was good. I was disappointed that the whirlpool wasn't working, there were no kleenex in the bathroom and it was noisey when we were trying to sleep. The staff was pleasant and the hotel was clean.

They were very accommodating I was traving with my 3 grown daughters my son-in-law and 4 grandkids. They let us check in early because we were going to the CP Holiday Train in Wauwatosa we returned to swim and had a very relaxing evening.
We had a good stay. Very clean, comfortable, and kid friendly. Only issue was security as locked doors often propped open. Close to outlet and in a quiet area.
My wife and I always seek out Comfort Suites to stay in when on the road and in particular when traveling to Watertown, WI. …
Have stayed there 3 years in a row.  ALWAYS have a hard time finding it. Called and asked desk guy to send up a flare or fireworks.  Good breakfast.

Clean and quite location as it was located kind of in a country setting which we were not expecting which was a plus. If pool was available would have been a perfect stay but, no go. So we had some disappointed kids.
Excellent hospitality for our family Christmas gathering.  Saturday breakfast attendant was awesome. When a child lost a coat, the hotel receptionist was very happy to be able to return it.

I called a couple of times a few weeks ago to request information about renting one of the conference rooms for a wedding reception. The receptionist was unenthused and told me the the person in charge wasn't there. I asked if she knew when return would return or if there was a better time to call to which I got a real short, "I don't know". Then I asked if I could leave a voicemail with them to which she quite literally huffed at and transferred me to a voicemail that was full. When I called back the next day, I got the same snooty receptionist which she had an even worse attitude that day. Needless to say, I still haven't been able to speak with anyone about a wedding reception rental.

My fiancé and I have/had called MULTIPLE times to reserve a block of rooms for our wedding. EVERY time they said they would call us back to discuss and set up the block for our needs. We NEVER received any phone calls back, mind you we have called 10 times over the course of about 3 weeks. They either push us off and say they will call back and never do, or no one answers in the first place. Absolutely ridiculous!

I have never had a team of staff be so concerned and eager to make our conference the best it could be. Great venue. Great food. Amazing service. Fun for our conference guests - lots of great after hours things to do and enjoy. Just a great experience for all.

I found the cleanliness of this hotel very poor. Carpeting was full of mud as was the bathroom and the smell was awful. It was like a construction worker stayed in the room and the cleaning staff just made the bed. Thought it to be old and run down.
Great service! And love the pool, it's not to deep for the kids plus an area with a water playset. Hot tub is huge, so even with other groups you still have space.
Nice Hotel but cleaning staff may need some guidance.  Bathroom within my room was definitely not cleaned, smelled of urine and feces splattered on the back of the toilet bowl and rim.

Service Manager was rude and unaccomodating for someone in the service industry.  Our request for four rooms for a bridal party to be ready two hours after checkout was not an extravagant request.  We were not assisted by the Service Manager at all.  I will not be booking any large events at this particular Comfort Suites.
Staff were very friendly even though we showed up late at night and our kids made a mess at breakfast! Facility was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was delicious!

Working with this hotel for a block for a wedding was absolutely the worst part of wedding planning. It was a nightmare. From the beginning I was told something different t every single time I called - beginning with not being able to accommodate as many guests as we would have, only to call back and be told that there were “so many open rooms for that weekend”. My guests were repeatedly told the block was closed and were not offered another room even though there were open rooms. The management threw their employees under the bus repeatedly, telling me to “contact so-and-so instead of the front desk because they don’t know what their doing”. After thinking we had things under control, I call back only to find that the person I was working with “was no longer with them”. I was told by on sales person that we would have a gift opening room on 10/14 free of charge due to all of the frustration we were going through - only to have no one on staff know about this room and be led around the hotel 4 different times for “our” room. After getting set up we had another group come and tell us that it was their room, then we were led around the hotel again being told we didn’t have a room and we’re given a dirty conference room from the day before. Complete nightmare and an embarrassment for the bride and groom. I will never stay at a comfort suites ever again. Also, when we arrived at the front desk, we were not acknowledged by the front desk staff until she finished her phone call and looked at us and uttered “what’s up?” Completely unprofessional.
Staff very friendly. Room was larger than expected. Pool hours longer than any other. We travel for softball and this hotel by far was the best we stayed in.

Price was quite high for the quality of hotel. Room could have been cleaner--especially the sofa/sleeper and bathroom. Front desk personnel could be trained to better handle malfunctioning / rank smelling refrigerators.

I enjoyed my stay at Comfort Suites very much! It is such a nice, clean and comfortable place to stay. The hotel staff were very helpful and welcoming. I would definitely make reservations at this hotel again!

We stay at this Motel anytime we have family visiting or special events going on. For the most part we have not been disappointed and would recommend it to everyone else. My most favorite part of this hotel and it's chains of hotels are the pillows and the beds!
Would definitely stay here again.  Cleanliness is a big deal to me and the room was fresh and clean.  The big pools and hot tub were fun for the kids

The furnishings were nice and I was at first optimistic as it seemed that it had been updated and modernized.  But, when we got to our room and also talked to the others from our group that had checked in earlier, we were disappointed to find that the nice, modernized furnishings just did not seem to be taken care of.

We have relatives in the area, and this is the hotel we always stay at. We have found that the rooms are bigger and nicer than rooms at other hotels in the area. My kids love the pool and play area, and they always serve a great breakfast.

This was my third time staying at this hotel. Every time the staff was excellent, bed is very comfortable, very clean room, coffee is great and nice selection of food for breakfast! Absolutely would recommend this hotel!
The room was huge and very clean. The front desk clerk was very friendly and helpful. The hotel just felt clean all over. Loved the breakfast.

There was blood stains on my sheet, and they didn't care when I told them that, they just asked what I would like them to do, the heat was broken in the swimming area so it was cold and they said they couldn't get anyone out until after …
The hotel and staff were great. The breakfast was just ok. We ate there the first day but went to McDonalds the second day. We would definitely recommend it to others and stay there again ourselves.
The room was clean and big. Nice pool area. We had a short stay, but it was really good. It's a little hike off the interstate to get to, but not bad.
Everything was very clean from the lobby to the spacious room. However when the fire alarms went off at 1230 am there was nobody at the desk. We didn't know if it was a false alarm or the real feal.

The front desk was excellent with customer service. We were very disappointed in the comfort of the bed. The bed was hard. And we were disappointed in the cleanliness. There were a lot of things in the room that weren’t wiped down

Close to fairgrounds. Excellent breakfast items and the pool and hot tub are always a highlight! Rooms are larger than normal hotel rooms and it is always easy to find a place to park with our trailers and campers. Hotel staff is always accommodating.

A great hotel for our family. Clean and cozy. Beds are comfortable and like the sectional couch! Great food and pool is great for the kids! If you are looking for a nice hotel with a good price, stop looking! This is it!
Large, comfortable room. Very clean. Friendly staff. Quiet. I would love the breakfast to have real eggs though!! No need for the powdered stuff. I would recommend this hotel and would stay again.
Hotel is pretty much off the beaten path.  But is nice clean and comfortable.  We were there for 2 nights and our beds did not get made after the first night.

Great place to stay, all the necessary  conveniences for a pleasurable stay, great hot tub and pool. Conveniently located for Johnson Creek Outlet stores. Breakfast was adequate as far as hotel breakfasts go. Great stay overall.
Other guest were very loud around bar time! Room was great! Needed milk maybe you guys could start selling little jugs.... thankful I got  accommodated
Overall it was just ok. Not great. Rooms are for sleeping not much else. Front desk personnel unconcerned about the needs of a handicapped person-in my opinion. Breakfasts were good. Maid helpful.
I have stayed at the comfort Suites - Johnson Creek before and was impressed.  The hotel is clean.  The staff is friendly.  I will stay here again when I am in the area.

Very large rooms, excellent service, and a nice hot breakfast. We came for a wedding, but will be back soon. Located near the outlet malls, and right off the interstate. We didn't have time to enjoy their pool, but can't wait next time!

The hotel was tucked away from the outlet mall. It was a little difficult to locate at first. The breakfast was very good. The room was very spacious and clean. The staff was friendly. We were pleased with our stay.

Hotel is well kept and clean, breakfast is the best assortment and quality around the area. Pool room and sauna are really nice. Staff are friendly and aim to please and provide quick and efficient service when needed.

the room was very affordable. we had 2 double beds and a pullout couch and the room was very spacious which was nice because we were staying multiple nights and needed room to get ready for a wedding. I'd definitely recommend staying here!

This is a great place to stay. Especially with a group of younger kids. We're older and we were not one bit disturbed by the "chaos" of the younger ones. The rooms are designed so well. We weren't one bit bothered by the kids.
Had blast with the family. The hot tub was out of service but we didn't let it ruin the trip.
Great location away from traffic!Not close to highway!Loved our stay! …
Greeted at front desk and obtained keys in a proper manner.  Room was very nice with a two bedroom suite.  It worked well for us with four adults.  Breakfast was just ok and adequate.
Very clean!! All staff was super friendly. Rooms were very spacious. Decent continental breakfast. Pool area was a blast for the kids!
Newer hotel near Bennett Barn with plenty of rooms for all your wedding guests.  Hosts weddings as well. Rooms are spacious and clean. Good getaway spot if you just need a night out of the house.

i was attending a wedding in the hotel. had a wonderful time. staff awesome. special thanks to jana and brenda they made for a fantastic time. breakfast was a let down. no breakfast meat. i was informed meat truck did not arrive
Great place to stay, nice and clean.  Be prepared if you can't get back until late due to a wedding...you may have to walk a distance for parking.
Great room, good price, clean but hot tub overrun by locals kids playing in the hot tub where adults are trying to relax. Parents paying no attention. Quiet at night when they leave though.

Great place to stay!! Nice rooms, pool area and friendly service! Will definitely be back if we're ever in the area.

Nice big room. Great service. Nice breakfast.

I will never recommend to anyone was a complete disappointment
Very clean and comfortable rooms. Staff is wonderful and went the extra mile to insure we had a lovely stay. Looking forward to our next trip back.

Service was really good. People were great. Location is a little bit off the beaten path, but it is easy to get to. The pool was down for maintenance for the weekend, but didn't know that until we showed up.  That was the most disappointing part.

the only problem we had with our stay at the Johnson crk comfort suite was it could have had better signs to the motel . every thing was very clean and receptionist was very helpful . the breakfast was very good. the beds were very comfortable.

Another great stay despite the big pool being emptied for painting.  I'm glad they are updating their facilities, just wish I would have been forewarned when I called ahead to check on the pool hours before booking.
Great size rooms, nice staff, but the water in the kids pool was a little cold

the staff was great, but the pool water was too cold. when I went in to check the water temp, some kids asked if I worked there to see if I could get raise the water temp. so I wasn't just me.

Girls outing with shopping, eating and enjoying the hotel.  We will return in the future.  Hotel staff was wonderful.  Rooms were so easy to relax and visit in.  Food and beverages offers a variety.

Staff is great rooms are fresh. Location is perfect for us.

Very nice I would stay there anytime Staff was very helpful and proactive.  My son was coming in after we checked in and we’re very accommodating with getting him checked in to our room while we were already at our event
Pleasant experience at this hotel! Staff was very friendly, hotel was clean and breakfast was great!
